      public boolean arrivedAtDestination​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f position, org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f destination, float allowedDeviation)
      Check if position is reached
      Parameters:
      position - current position of the Npc
      destination - destination to reach
      allowedDeviation - allowed Deviation in x and z Coord
      Returns:
      boolean true if arrived or fals if not

    • escapeFromPositionWithMinDistance

      public boolean escapeFromPositionWithMinDistance​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f currentPosition, org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f escapeFromPosition, int minDistanceBetween)
      Return true if the currentPosition has minDistance reached
      Parameters:
      currentPosition - position of Npc
      escapeFromPosition - position escape from
      minDistanceBetween - amount of blocks between
      Returns:
      boolean true is min distance between is reached else false

      Return a new Position in the World with minDistance and avoid last Position
      Parameters:
      currentPosition - current NPC position
      lastDirection - last direction to avoid them
      minDistanceBetween - min distance between old and new place
      Returns:
      Vector3f new position
